name: This is a small town
description:
Game Introduction：

This game is produced by RPG production master MZ.
The game adopts a 2D RPG scene, with 2D character CG images displaying the key plot (satellite: static CG will be changed to dynamic CG at the end).
At present, the game has not been completed yet, and there are some issues that are reasonable. We hope you can understand.

Content Introduction：

This is a casual role-playing shooter game.
The protagonist went to a strange town to work but unexpectedly fell into a conspiracy.
In order to protect himself, the protagonist is not allowed to investigate the truth, but as a result, he has developed a complex relationship with some beautiful women that is constantly in turmoil.
Firstly, start with the family members of the suspect, and finally achieve the story of collecting all the beautiful women in their own harem.
The game has not been completed yet, and there are relatively few scenes that everyone wants to watch. Friends who are still hesitant can wait.
There will be various plot twists in the future.
Each female character with a vertical painting will have their own unique story.
